CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 18, 1963, pg. 13 reads: "Mother's Day Celebration - Mr. and Mrs. William B. Pinnix of Hermitage St., Homewood, gave a birthday party in honor of his mother, Mrs. E.B.Pinnix, at their home, on Mother's Day. The honoree is surrounded by (clockwise) Mrs. O. Williams, Mrs. H. Young, Mrs. R. Smithers, Mr. Pinnix, the host; Mrs. Joe Robinson, Mrs. A. Jackson and Mrs. Mary Edmonds.  Mrs. Smithers and Mrs. Edmonds are sisters of the honoree. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Birthday celebration for Mrs. E .B. Pinnix, wearing corsage, eyeglasses, and double strand beaded necklace, seated in center, surrounded by, left to right, Mary Edmonds, two unknown girls, and unknown man wearing plaid suit jacket, posed in home on Hermitage Street in Homewood
